column4: Description
Allows a user access to the Module Editor and depreciation methods
Allows a user access to the PalantirCASH Audit Log
Allows a user to manage Hierarchies
Allows a user to unlock PalantirCASH Documents
Allows a user access to the Reconciliation module
Allows a user to configure the Reconciliation module
Allows a user to create, update, deactivate and import data into Reconciliations
Allows a user to delete Reconciliations
Allows a user to restart an approvals process
Allows a user to print reports
Allows a user access to the PlanningSpace Audit Log
Allows a user to generate and utilize API keys for web API calls
Allows a user to manage Users, Workgroups, Roles and Security Settings
Allows a user to configure Currencies
Allows a user to configure Prices
Allows a user access to the Decline workspace
Allows a user to access the auto-forecast feature in the Well Browser
Allows a user to add and remove revision tags in revision history

Allows a user to create, edit, and delete load templates
Allows a user to delete wells in bulk using the hierarchy
Allows a user to delete wells or well groups
Allows a user to load forecast data into well documents
Allows a user to load historical data in to well documents
Allows a user to unlock Wells and Well Groups
Allows a user to update wells or well groups. Note: not having this role supersedes the Load* and Execute Load* roles.
Allows a user to use templates to load data
Allows a user access to the Manage Data workspace

Allows a user to manage Versions

Allows a user to run reports
Allows a user to specify the currency settings used by a Document
Allows a user to specify the date settings used by a Document
Allows a user to specify the Economics settings used by a Document
Allows a user to terminate a Workflow
Allows a user to unlock Document Templates
Allows a user to unlock Documents
Allows the user to apply and remove revision tags in the Manage Data workspace
